reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We have just returned from our first trip to Cyprus and the Sunrise Beach Hotel was faultless.
reviews.title: faultless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reason for our visit was a family wedding, which went without a hitch with thanks to Denise!
reviews.title: Brilliant Sunrise Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed in the Sunrise for two weeks and i cannot find anything negative to say.
reviews.title: Location, location, location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is fantastic, right on the beach and in the centre of the strip.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Cyprus by far!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We had a side sea view room which was spotlessly clean from us arriving to us leaving...the cleaners came in everyday without fail and changed towels and sheets.
reviews.title: wow wow wow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Sunrise for 10 nights and had perhaps the best holiday ever! (We have stayed in Protaras 5 times.) Excellent hotel in a great location but what made the difference was the staff, everyone was pleasant without being over the top. In particular, Ajith in the restaurant. I am a vegetarian and he was so helpful each night informing me of suitable dishes and even offered to prepare me something else if I wanted. The food was the best that we had had in a hotel. The Maitre d'hotel was very efficient too. Whilst we were there we met Denise, from guest relations and she went out of her way to make sure that we had a nice holiday, as did every member of staff we met.
reviews.title: Best yet!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thankfully the hotel isn't all inclusive, which adds to the ambience and quality of service. Another bonus was having your sunbeds allocated for the duration of the stay.
reviews.title: the most beautiful place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Overall, one of the best holidays we've ever had, thankyou to everyone at Sunrise for making our holiday one to remember!
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Protaris

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ME and my boyfriend went to sunrise beach this june, im 17 and he's 18 so the price was a bit much for us but once we were there it was worth every single penny.. i literally can't think of anything bad to say about this hotel, your right on the beach and at the front of the hotel there is a huge strip with around 60shops and restaurants on.. the food was gorgeous from everywhere we went and cheap so we ate out every night.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also we booked about 6 months before so got an amazing room where we had a seaview even though we were at the side of the hotel, the hotel and beach are beautiful, i couldn't fault it one bit, if you do go i suggest going to waterworld, it's really fun there..
reviews.title: A superb hotel and excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Lovely aspect - right next to the beach. Lovely pool area and spotlessly clean. Helpful and pleasant staff - I thought this was a smashing hotel.
reviews.title: Terrific Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Sunrise Beach on the recommendation of friends who have stayed there many times. The location is fantastic, right in the middle of Protaras, with a wonderful pool area and beach front.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Cyprus!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We were first time vistors to the hotel, but were made to feel very welcome and relaxed by the attentive staff, especially at mealtimes. The Maitre'd Neo stands out in memory as someone who welcomed us every night and remembered our names.
reviews.title: We loved it and we'll be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel facilities were excellent, and we had a thoroughly relaxing time. We will be booking to come back next year as soon as we can!
reviews.title: Will definately return for a 5th time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the service to be excellent from reception through to housekeeping and bar staff (who were very obliging in checking contents of food as one of the children has an egg allergy). The room was a good size and clean with tea making faclities. The manager arranged for us to have adjoining rooms which was a bonus with 2 small children. Although in the centre of Protoras you wouldn't know it. The hotel is directly on the beach and restaurants etc a few minutes up a road which has a slope. Although not steep and only short it could cause problems if you had a wheelchair etc but still is accessible and shouldn't deter anyone with a wheelchair. The pool is lovely and not having to "find" a sunchair each day is an added bonus as you are allocated one on arrival. Perhaps a benefit would be 1 or 2 playpens in the pool area for those with small children. There are plenty of highchairs available for breakfast which has a lovely selection of food. We can honestly say we really couldn't find anything negative about the hotel - this was our second visit and we certainly hope to return in the future.
reviews.title: Fantastic Sunrise Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose to stay at the Sunrise Beach Hotel for our Honeymoon in June 2001 as we saw the wonderful reviews on this website and we were not disappointed!! When we arrived at the hotel at about 4am local time we were told that as we had arrived to the hotel so late, we could have full-board the next day. We had booked half-board for our Honeymoon so this was such a surprise and very much appreciated! The room was wonderful and we had a complimentary bottle of champagne, bottle of water and fruit waiting for us in our room when we arrived -what a wonderful way to start our honeymoon! The Manager at the hotel had also written a personal letter congratulating us on our wedding which was a lovely touch. As we were going for such a special occasion we booked a sea-view room. The view was amazing! The rooms were great and as we upgraded we had a King-size bed, plasma TV, minibar, tea & coffee making facilities and air-conditioning which is included in the price of the holiday. We also had a safety deposit box which is only 2 euros per day – such great value! We also had dressing gowns, slippers & complimentary tea & coffee throughout our stay and the minibar was replenished (if used) every day. Maid service was also excellent. They always did a great job. The bathroom in the room was to a very good standard and if required you could have clean towels changed every day. Another great thing about this hotel is that they give you allocated sunbeds which are then yours for your whole holiday! This should be compulsory in all hotels as it gives you the freedom to go to your beds whatever time you like without having to worry that you won’t get a bed. We chose to have sunbeds on the small private beach, but we could have chosen to be by the pool or on the grass - there is so much selection! You also get clean beach towels everyday so no need to pack any which is great!! The service at this hotel was 5 star!!! The staff just couldn't do enough for you and were always so friendly and polite. The food at breakfast was lovely and there was so much choice at the buffet, whatever time you went down! You could choose to have continental, toast, fruit, cereal or cooked breakfast. The food at the evening buffet was also lovely – really fresh and a great choice! The salad bar was always fresh and desserts were delicious! I’d recommend going to their ‘Greek Night’ if you stay at this hotel. It was such fun and get every involved! The waiters and manager at the restaurant were always so polite and couldn’t do enough for you. We were also given another complimentary bottle of champagne on our last night to celebrate our Honeymoon – so generous and kind of them. The hotel is right in the middle of Protaras with shops, bars and other restaurants right on your doorstep. The 'strip' can be quite lively at night, with bars playing live music but that did not bother us. As the hotel is right on the beach, when you walk back into the hotel you can't hear a thing - well we didnt anyway! All in all we had such a wonderful Honeymoon at the Sunrise and will definitely be coming back to this hotel again. We recommend it to anyone who is thinking of going to Protaras. Can’t wait to go back now!!
reviews.title: So pleased we chose this hotel for Honeymoon! It was amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from our third trip to the Sunrise Beach.If you are thinking of booking this hotel for a holiday do not hesitate,it is that good.Many,many people return to this hotel such as ourselves time and time again.Have no fear this is the best hotel in Protaras.
reviews.title: "Do not hesitate"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We are just back from the Sunrise Beach, we were married there and what can i say we had the most wonderful time, we felt so special not only on our wedding day but every day. Denise and Zoe were brilliant couldnt do enough for us. We were upgraded to a corner suite it was beautiful. We will definatley go back and all i can say about people that complain about this hotel is that they are far too fussy.
reviews.title: We loved it and will definatley be back!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is fourth time we stayed at Sunrise Hotel and for sure not the last.
reviews.title: Definitely a Sunrise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: Every time is getting better!
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
